-- | Low-level wrapping of POSIX waitpid(2).
--   
--   A low-level wrapping of POSIX waitpid(2).
@package posix-waitpid
@version 0.1

module System.Posix.Waitpid
c_waitpid :: CPid -> Ptr CInt -> CInt -> IO CPid
data Flag
NoHang :: Flag
IncludeUntraced :: Flag
IncludeContinued :: Flag
data Status
Exited :: Int -> Status
Signaled :: Signal -> Status
Stopped :: Signal -> Status
Continued :: Status
waitpid :: CPid -> [Flag] -> IO (Maybe (CPid, Status))
instance Show Status
instance Eq Status
instance Show Flag
